extendedInfo.description: Want an easy way to help organise your life and make the best use of your valuable time! WotsNext is here to help you do just that. An easy to use app that allows you to quickly add a task but has flexible and powerful features to keep you on top of your life.FEATURES IN FREE VERSON:* Quick and easy to create, edit and mark tasks off* Assign user-defined categories to tasks* Assign priorities to tasks* Repeat tasks when completed - daily, weekly or monthly* Set alarms to notify you when tasks are due, including the ability to set two alarms for a given task* Re-occurring alarm notifications until cleared* Daily notifications of your dayâs tasks* Search for tasks and calendar events* Link a contact to a task that can be opened from the list* Entered locations can be displayed in Google Maps* Quick filters to allow you to quickly filter the task list to easy see whatâs coming up* Swipe task to set it complete* Auto-deletion of completed tasks* Daily backup of all your data to SD Card or even your Cloud storage with WotsNext Plus* Support for tablets with landscape views* 6 Color themes to choose from* Home Screen widgets to suit all versions of Android. A new version takes advantage of features in new Android versions. For Android 4.2+ users, the widget can be placed on the Lock Screen* Ad freeFEATURES IN PLUS (PAID) VERSION:* View tasks by day, week or month with the Calendar Views* Ability to view two days in Day Calendar View in landscape mode on 10" tablets and most 7" newer tabets* Ability to view two weeks in Week Calendar View in landscape mode on 10" tablets and most 7" newer tabets* Display calendar events stored on your deviceâs Google Calendar* Export tasks in CSV or HTML formats for viewing and printing* Synchronize your tasks and categories with all your devices running WotsNext Plus* Access your Cloud storage to export files, sync devices and backup your data to. Currently Dropbox and Box are supported with Google Drive coming soon.* More features are on their way...To enable the Plus features in WotsNext, you need to purchase the WotsNext Plus Key available from the Android Market. Keywords: wotsnext,  wots next, to do, to-do, list, what's next, personal task manager, day planner, daily planner, GTD, getting things done, organizer, checklist, task list, cloud, synchronize

reviews.title: Improved!
reviews.comment: This app is being actively developed, and is simply the best looking of the dozen task apps I have tested. I am very satisfied with the pro key, which let\'s you show Google Calendar events in the (beautiful) widget.
reviews.author: Nicholas Smith

reviews.title: Usefyl
reviews.comment: Not bad
reviews.author: angel acevedo

reviews.title: Not for me
reviews.comment: I needed repeating task settings to be more complex. I needed to repeat every x hours and a choice to have it repeat after task complete or at due time. Plus other things...
reviews.author: Olivia Lee

reviews.title: Usable, but don\'t be too greedy
reviews.comment: Does the job OK. But $3.29 is way too much for a simple little app.  .99 would be more realistic.
reviews.author: Uri K

reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: Marissa Renee E

reviews.title: Battery draining, data using ads.
reviews.comment: On a productivity app? Should be able to evaluate the app without those hassles before shelling out the three bucks for the pro key. Sticking with Any.Do and Todoist.
reviews.author: Asha Ellis

reviews.title: Like Any Do better
reviews.comment: I like Any Do better because of the daily morning pop-up option to plan your day. I hit snooze too often. I like Any Do but I want something like this but with a calendar looking schedule by hours & days, weeks, months, etc.
reviews.author: Donnie Ball

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: The app is great. Pros: Shows overdue tasks and completed tasks unlike many other apps.  Cons: Widget text is too small. Need to have an option to increase font size. Mark tasks complete from the widget itself.
reviews.author: Angel Nalbantov

reviews.title: Very nice, just one thing
reviews.comment: I tried it out, and find  it needs to remind even if you don\'t set a task to compleated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic - By far the best of breed!
reviews.comment: I must have tried 20 or so todo lists and task organisers and none of them did what I wanted. This app works brilliantly in virtually every aspect. I add tasks, put them into categories (if I want to), give them dates (via a touch calendar not putting in dates), and then the magic happens. I can view my week, month or day, and see all the tasks for that day/week etc. Even the widget (I  use the biggest one on a full screen) is perfect and I chose to keep completed tasks showing which gives me a great feeling of productivity. I have purchased the full app and am really, really happy with almost every aspect of it. A truly great app that feels solid and reliable. This is the 2nd most important app I have (second only to my email app) and I use it daily and constantly. (I was so annoyed at the other todo apps and calendar apps that I seriously considered writing my own. Now I have found this, no need, it does everything.)  PS The two selection boxes make it soooooo useful. One does todays tasks, this weeks, overdue etc and the other does categories. A simple but incredibly useful sorting feature!) Five stars easily - Thank you and for the \302\2432 it cost a real bargain!
reviews.author: Paul Drewett

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Love it! Now I\'m totally organised
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wots
reviews.comment: Nice helpfull app, can see wots   coming up in following days, makes juggling arrangements easier, quick and efficient response to queries
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!!!
reviews.comment: Integrates nicely with Gmail calendar, app and widget display info exactly as I wish. Excellent!!!  I love Wotsnext Plus and highly recommend it!  I am extremely pleased.  =)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Invasive permissions..
reviews.comment: Unacceptable!..may have been a good app. Never tried it. Read my Sensitive Data?.. and more...???..Uninstall. ty, but no ty. Waaaay better apps with less permissions!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Two words-LOVE IT! Tried sooo many apps.  Please consider adding a filter by Priority similar to how we filter by category. Maybe location filter too?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: This app rocks!!! As I have gotten older my memory has taken a toll for the worst. I use this app for EVERTHING. To schedule stuff, bill reminder....I could go on and on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Its app is amazing is the best app out there . it lets you do whatever you want and whatEver you need to stay  updated . I never forget what i have to do now... thumbs up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This app is too good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay app
reviews.comment: The app is okay but lacks customization. I have so many overdue tasks that the widget won\'t remind me to do it just defeats the purpose. I will be looking for an alternative.
reviews.author: A Google User
